msContents.summary: Complete text of the Nālaṭiyār with substantial commentary (corresponding for the Atikāra Aṭaivu to the Viḷakka Urai, for the Kaṭavuḷ Vāḻttu and 400 to Tarumar in the Caracuvatimakāl edition) and satellite material, colophon (no date but scribal caveat).

yā vāymaiyāl - vāṉiṉkaṇṇē tōṉṟiya villiṉatu tōṟṟamu miḻappu maṟiya variyatu - atu pōṉṟa piṟappiṉa tiyalpaiyu maṟivaritu - yitu uṇmaiyātalā

kiya vēṭṭuṟuppukaḷum muntum paṭikku orumaiyuṭaṉ vaṇakkañ ceytu - verse 1 on f. 7r, l. 6

var ceṉṟa vaḻiyē nammai varuttañ ceytateṉṟavāṟu ~ kaṇmūṉṟuṭaiyāṉ piḻaittalāvatu kāmaṉai yiruvaḻittavaṉa - piṉpu mavaṉai yuḷakkiṉāṉeṉpatām ~ kākkai pi
